messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Net nanny?
messages.msgSnippet: On Sun, 09 Sep 2001 11:53:37 -0700 Pam Hartley ... Actually, I am hoping his addiction will not extend itself to the computer.  But even if he did try to watch
messages.messageBody:
On Sun, 09 Sep 2001 11:53:37 -0700 Pam Hartley
<pamhartley@...> writes:
>
>
> What will happen when your son discovers he can watch television on
> line?
>
> Pam

Actually, I am hoping his addiction will not extend itself to the
computer. But even if he did try to watch by computer, our modem is so
lousy it won't hold much interest long. Heck, I get frustrated and drive
to the library to do research sometimes because of the lousey service!

Bridget

~~~~If electricity comes from electrons...does that mean that morality
comes from morons?~~~~
I sent my Soul through the Invisible,
Some letter of that After-life to spell;
And by and by my Soul returned to me,
And answered, "I Myself am Heaven and Hell." -- The Rubaiyat
